Feature.Name: Eldritch Smite
Feature.Text: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can expend a warlock spell slot to deal an extra 1d8 force damage to the target, plus another 1d8 per level of the spell slot. If the target takes any of this damage, you can knock the target prone if it is Huge or smaller.
Feature.Prerequisite: 5th level, Pact of the Blade feature
